title: #235: First Responder; A 9/11 Story (Cris Italia)
itunes:title: First Responder; A 9/11 Story with Cris Italia
description: 9/11 was a terrible day in American history. This is one story of the many stories of that day. Cris Italia was a volunteer EMT and was around the corner when the first plane hit. By the time the second plane hit, he was already at ground zero, helping. It's a heartbreaking story of what happened to one man the day America stopped being invincible.
